program.name: lyx
program.configure:
case "${SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=common" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=common -ftemplate-depth-30" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-bbigtoc -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" QT_UIC="${SB_VAR_LIBQT}/bin/uic" ;; *-hpux11*) CFLAGS="-O2 -march=1.1" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -march=1.1" ARGS="--x-includes=/usr/include/X11R6 --x-libraries=/usr/lib/X11R6" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-irix6*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mips4" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mips4" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-linux9*|*-linuxe3*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," QT_UIC="${SB_VAR_LIBQT}/bin/uic" ;; *-linux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-osf*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=ev4" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=ev4" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-solaris2.[89]) LIB_ASPELL="${SB_VAR_ASPELL_LIB}" QT_INC="${SB_VAR_LIBQT_INC}" QT_LIB="${SB_VAR_LIBQT_LIB}" QT_UIC="${SB_VAR_LIBQT}/bin/uic" CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris2.5.1) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v7" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v7" CC_LD_RT="-R" QT_UIC="${SB_VAR_LIBQT}/bin/uic" ;; *-solaris2*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v7" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v7" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CXX="${CXX:-g++}" CXXFLAGS="${CXXFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_AIKSAURUS_INC} -I${SB_VAR_XPM_INC}" \ LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_AIKSAURUS_LIB} -L${SB_VAR_JPEG_LIB} \ -L${SB_VAR_XPM_LIB} ${SB_VAR_GCC_RT+-L${SB_VAR_GCC_RT_LIB}} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+-L${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}} \ ${CC_LD_RT}${QT_LIB:-${SB_VAR_LIBQT_LIB}/gcc32}:\ ${SB_VAR_JPEG_LIB}:${SB_VAR_XPM_LIB}:${SB_VAR_LIBTIFF_LIB}:\ ${SB_VAR_AIKSAURUS_LIB}:${LIB_ASPELL:-${SB_VAR_ASPELL_LIB}/gcc32}\ ${SB_VAR_GCC_RT+:${SB_VAR_GCC_RT_LIB}}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+:${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}} ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ --with-included-gettext --disable-dependency-tracking \ ${SB_VAR_ASPELL+--with-pspell} \ ${SB_VAR_ASPELL+--with-pspell-includes=${SB_VAR_ASPELL_INC}} \ ${SB_VAR_ASPELL+--with-pspell-libs=${LIB_ASPELL:-${SB_VAR_ASPELL_LIB}/gcc32}} \ --datadir="${_datadir}" --with-frontend=qt \ --with-qt-includes=${QT_INC:-${SB_VAR_LIBQT_INC}/gcc32} \ --with-qt-libraries=${QT_LIB:-${SB_VAR_LIBQT_LIB}/gcc32} \ qt_cv_path_uic=${QT_UIC:-${SB_VAR_LIBQT}/bin/gcc32/uic} \ ${ARGS+${ARGS}} --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}

item.para: It adds support for old files from LyX 0.10.x or 0.12.x
Lyx documents can now be opened and edited even if they use text classes not present in your latex installation
New Qt features have been added (improved selection, drag-and-drop)
Mac OS X support is much improved
The interface and documentation localization have been polished

note.para: LyX uses Ghostscript to generate Postscript output. The ghostscript binary, `gs', must be in your $PATH for LyX to invoke ghostscript correctly.
The Aspell spell checking library and Aiksaurus thesaurus are available.
LyX uses fonts in the ``${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/share'' directory. Unless users can add these fonts locally, they must be added to a global directory for use by xfs, the X Font Server.
